markdownRemark.html:
Hast thou reason? I have. Why then makest thou not use of it? For if thy reason do her part, what more canst thou require?

XII. As a part hitherto thou hast had a particular subsistence: and now

nothing at all, but what reason proceeding from that regal and supreme part…
